disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with Zoho CRM
disconnected.subtitle: Integrate all information from your Zoho Leads and Contacts into your Doppler Lists automatically. Just follow the steps below. If you have any doubt, press
disconnected.app_key_placeholder: Enter your Zoho store App Key
disconnected.connection_error: Oops! We could not connect with Zoho please try again later.
disconnected.step2: 2. Complete the following Fields with data from Zoho CRM:

connected.title: Integrate your modules
connected.subtitle_list_count: You currently have {{availableLists}} Lists. Be aware that you can sync Lists manually whenever you want.
connected.subtitle: Pick the Zoho module and the Doppler List you want to sync with.
connected.select_list_warning: If the chosen List already has associated Contacts, they will be removed. Only Contacts that have come from the integration will be saved.

delete_mode_grid.message: The synchronization will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: By confirming this disconnection, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your Zoho account. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.

connected.status: Your Zoho CRM is connected to Doppler

mapping.title: Fields mapping
mapping.subtitle: Select the Fields to import to your List.
mapping.empty_email_error_message: Ouch! There must be at least one Email field selected.
